designInnovations.title: Full-Screen Timeline Detail Panel
designInnovations.problem: Timeline detail information was confined to a small floating box (420px), limiting visual hierarchy and making inefficient use of viewport space. Users felt cramped viewing detailed experience information.
designInnovations.solution: Transformed fixed-size card into full-viewport layout (100vw × 100vh) with strategic content distribution across four zones (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right).

techniques.name: CSS display: contents
techniques.description: Used display: contents on detail-inner to distribute child elements using position: absolute without nesting constraints
techniques.benefit: Allows semantic HTML structure while enabling absolute positioning of child elements across the viewport

techniques.name: Radial Gradient Backdrop
techniques.description: Layered multiple radial gradients (pink at 30%/30%, cyan at 70%/80%) with semi-transparent dark background
techniques.benefit: Creates depth and visual interest without blocking the background image, maintains brand colors (FF6B9D, A8DADC)

techniques.name: Asymmetric Zone Distribution
techniques.description: Header info top-left (45% width), description top-right (40% width), skills bottom-left, highlights bottom-right
techniques.benefit: Natural reading flow + balanced visual composition + room for future expansion

techniques.name: Responsive Collapse
techniques.description: At 768px and below, zones revert to flex column layout, maintaining content hierarchy without absolute positioning

typography.title: 2.2rem / 800 weight (expanded from 1.4rem)
typography.company: Added badge styling with border + background

animations: Highlight bullets: larger (1.4rem) with improved color contrast

designInnovations.title: Animated Chevron Scroll Indicator
designInnovations.problem: Users loading the /about-me page felt lost - no visual indication that content exists below the fold. Full-screen timeline didn't signal scrollability.
designInnovations.solution: Created reusable ScrollIndicator component with 3 staggered chevrons using gradient colors that auto-hides on scroll.

techniques.name: Staggered Animation
techniques.description: Three chevrons with 0.3s delay between each, continuous 1.5s loop with easing
techniques.benefit: Visual rhythm that attracts attention without being distracting

techniques.name: Gradient Text Clipping
techniques.description: Used -webkit-background-clip: text with pink→cyan gradient on SVG stroke

techniques.name: Auto-Hide on Scroll
techniques.description: useEffect listener hides indicator when scrollY > 100px

techniques.name: Opacity Staggering
techniques.description: 0.5 → 0.75 → 1.0 opacity for depth effect (closer chevron more visible)
